document.full_text: cam ward made 42 saves to record his fourth shutout of the season that backstopped the carolina hurricanes to a 3-0 victory over the detroit red wings on wednesday and maintained their playoff hopes.
document.title: ward, hurricanes shutout wings to keep playoff hopes alive
lines_and_colors: cam ward made 42 saves to record his fourth shutout of the season that backstopped the carolina hurricanes to a 3-0 victory over the detroit red wings on wednesday and maintained their playoff hopes.
